All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CommentClient
Feign client interface for interacting with the Comment Service.
CommentValidationServiceImpl
Service implementation for validating comments related to posts.
CommentValidationServiceInterface
Interface for validating comments associated with posts.
CreatePostDTO
Data Transfer Object for creating a new post.
KafkaConfig
Configuration class for setting up Kafka components and properties.
LikeClient
Feign client interface for interacting with the Like Service.
LikeValidationServiceImpl
Service implementation for validating likes related to posts.
LikeValidationServiceInterface
Interface for validating likes associated with posts.
LoggingAspect
Aspect for centralized logging of application methods.
MediaClient
Feign client interface for interacting with the Media Service.
MediaValidationServiceImpl
Service implementation for validating media related to posts.
MediaValidationServiceInterface
Interface for validating media associated with post creation.
OpenPostDTO
Data Transfer Object for viewing an open post.
Post
Entity class representing a Post in the system.
PostController
 
PostNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a requested post is not found.
PostProcessor
Processor responsible for converting Post entities into CreatePostDTO and generating PostEvent for post-related actions.
PostProcessorInterface
Interface for processing posts and converting them to different representations.
PostRepository
Repository interface for managing Post entities.
PostServiceApplication
The entry point of the Post Service application.
PostServiceImpl
Implementation of the PostServiceInterface, providing services for managing posts.
PostServiceInterface
Interface for managing posts in the system.
RedisConfig
Configuration class for Redis caching.
SwaggerConfig
Configuration class for Swagger API documentation.
UpdatePostDTO
Data Transfer Object for updating an existing post.
UserClient
Feign client interface for interacting with multiple user-related services.
UserDeletedEventHandler
Handles events related to a user being deleted.
UserValidationServiceImpl
Implementation of the UserValidationServiceInterface, providing user validation services.
UserValidationServiceInterface
Interface for validating users when creating posts.
ValidationServiceImpl
Implementation of the ValidationServiceInterface, providing various validation services.
ValidationServiceInterface
Interface for validating various aspects of post-related data.
